original_title: Frank Caprio, judge who drew huge audience on reality show with his compassion, dies at age 88 from cancer | CNN
article_summary: Retired Rhode Island Judge Frank Caprio, known for his compassionate approach and online fame as a caring jurist, has passed away at the age of 88 after a battle with pancreatic cancer. Caprio, who retired in 2023, was celebrated for his empathetic courtroom demeanor, addressing issues of unequal access to the judicial system, and his popular show "Caught in Providence."</s>
